name: MINCBet
description: Automated brain extraction tool wrapper for the MINC libraries

inputs.name: Input file
inputs.description: Input image file in mnc format

inputs.name: Mask file
inputs.description: Output brain mask in mnc format

inputs.name: Fractional intensity threshold
inputs.description: Fractional intensity threshold (0->1); default=0.5; smaller values give larger brain outline estimates

inputs.name: Vertical gradient fractional intensity threshold
inputs.description: Vertical gradient in fractional intensity threshold (-1->1); default=0; positive values give larger brain outline at bottom, smaller at top

inputs.name: Hyperintensity ratio threshold
inputs.description: Ratio for hyperintense voxels (>1) (best for t1); smaller values remove more brain; default=none

inputs.name: Overlay flag
inputs.description: Generate brain surface outline overlaid onto original image

inputs.name: No segmented brain image flag
inputs.description: Don't generate segmented brain image output

inputs.name: BIC brain-view format flag
inputs.description: Generate surface mask in BIC brain-view format

inputs.name: Intensity reversal flag
inputs.description: Reversed intensities, like t2 and pd

inputs.name: Threshold segmented image flag
inputs.description: Apply thresholding to segmented brain image and mask

output-files.name: Output mask file
output-files.description: Segmented brain mask file in mnc format

output-files.name: Surface overlay file
output-files.description: Overlaid brain surface onto original image in mnc format

output-files.name: Approximate skull file
output-files.description: Approximate skull image file in mnc format

output-files.name: Binary brain mask file
output-files.description: Binary brain mask file in mnc format

output-files.name: BIC brain-view mask file
output-files.description: Surface mask in BIC brain-view format
